trends: There have been no other sightings in New Holland
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting details09-apr-13. driving south on egypt pike between new holland, ohio and huston road at 20:52. saw an amber light appear to my front and left at about 15-20 degrees above the horizon. it appeard, seemed to drop and disappeared. saw a second to the left and above the first. it acted similar to the first. then saw a third, again left and above the second. it acted as the other two. seemed to resemble flares that i saw in the military, but gave off no light nor did i notice any parachutes allowing them to drift. i immediately looked to see if i could observe an airplane or something that dropped these. i could not see anything in the vicinity. there are always plane\choppers in the area. but, i saw none in the area when i observed the lights.
Summary: Amber lights, similar to flares. However no chutes observed. Watch one, then second, then third.
